codeSystems.name: PLR_DK_IHE_TypeCode
codeSystems.title: PLR-DK IHE TypeCode
codeSystems.description: PLR-DK: Value set for the typeCode attribute. The typeCode specifies the precise type of document from the user perspective. The granularity of typeCode is finer grained than its superior classCode.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreHealthcareFacilityTypeCode
codeSystems.title: IHE HealthcareFacilityTypeCode
codeSystems.description: Value set for healthcare facility type code represents the type of organizational setting of the clinical encounter during which the documented act occurred.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CorePracticeSettingCode
codeSystems.title: IHE PracticeSettingCode
codeSystems.description: Values used for the document metadata attribute practiceSettingCode, which is an attribute specifying the clinical specialty where the act that resulted in the document was performed (e.g., Family Practice, Laboratory, Radiology). The value set is based on a subset of the code list from the SOR lookup table 'SOR-Kliniske specialer' (https://sor.sum.dsdn.dk/lookupdata/#clinical_speciality, accessable on Sundhedsdatanettet (SDN)), which is based on SNOMED codes.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreClassCode
codeSystems.title: IHE ClassCode
codeSystems.description: Value set for the classCode attribute. classCode used in DK IHE Document sharing

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_ConfidentialityCode
codeSystems.title: IHE ConfidentialityCode
codeSystems.description: Confidentiality code used in Danish Document sharing.

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreDkHomeCommunityId
codeSystems.title: IHE HomeCommunityId
codeSystems.description: List of operational and in production home communities (XCA) in Danish Document Sharing

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreLanguageCode
codeSystems.title: IHE LanguageCode
codeSystems.description: Tags for the Identification of Languages (RFC 3066)

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_CoreMimeType
codeSystems.title: IHE MimeType
codeSystems.description: Values for the document metadata attribute mimeType

codeSystems.name: MedComIHE_PLR_DK_FormatCode
codeSystems.title: PLR-DK IHE FormatCode
codeSystems.description: PLR-DK: Code system for document format code used in national Document sharing. The value set for format code is based on code system DK_IHE_FormatCode.
